name: Momentum Breakout
description: Identify stocks making fresh intraday highs/lows with volume expansion above average. Enter in breakout direction.
entryRules: Fresh intraday high/low with volume expansion
Avoid if breakout near major resistance/support without volume confirmation
optionsLogic: Buy ATM or 1 strike ITM CE (bullish); Buy ATM or 1 strike ITM PE (bearish)
entryLogic: Fresh intraday high/low with volume expansion
exitLogic: Exit on stop or target; avoid: Choppy range markets
stopLogic: Stop below/above structure or VWAP break; risk MEDIUM

name: VWAP Trend Ride
description: Enter long when price sustains above VWAP with higher lows and strong volume. Enter short when price sustains below VWAP with lower highs.
entryRules: Long: price above VWAP, higher lows, strong volume
Short: price below VWAP, lower highs
Exit if price closes decisively back through VWAP
optionsLogic: ATM CE when above VWAP; ATM PE when below VWAP
entryLogic: Long: price above VWAP, higher lows, strong volume
exitLogic: Exit on stop or target; avoid: Choppy around VWAP
stopLogic: Stop below/above structure or VWAP break; risk MEDIUM

name: Pullback Continuation
description: In a strong trend, wait for pullback to VWAP/EMA. Enter when price shows rejection (bullish/bearish candle + volume return) in direction of original trend.
entryRules: Strong trend intact; wait for pullback to VWAP/EMA
Enter on rejection candle (bullish/bearish) + volume return
Trade in direction of original trend
optionsLogic: ATM CE (bullish) or PE (bearish) on bounce
avoidWhen: Entering too early during deep reversal
entryLogic: Strong trend intact; wait for pullback to VWAP/EMA
exitLogic: Exit on stop or target; avoid: Entering too early during deep reversal
stopLogic: Stop below/above structure or VWAP break; risk MEDIUM

name: Opening Range Breakout (ORB)
description: Mark first 5–15 minute high/low. Enter on breakout with volume expansion and index confirmation. Avoid fake breakouts without follow-through candles.
entryRules: Define range from first 5–15 min high/low
Enter on breakout with volume expansion
Require index confirmation; avoid fake breakouts without follow-through
optionsLogic: ATM or 1 OTM in direction of break
entryLogic: Define range from first 5–15 min high/low
exitLogic: Exit on stop or target; avoid: Inside small range day
stopLogic: Stop below/above structure or VWAP break; risk MEDIUM

name: RSI Reversal Fade
description: If RSI > 70 near resistance → look for short fade. If RSI < 30 near support → look for long bounce. Confirm with slowing momentum and volume drop.
entryRules: Confirm with slowing momentum and volume drop
optionsLogic: Counter-trend: PE when overbought, CE when oversold
exitLogic: Exit on stop or target; avoid: Strong breakout trend day
stopLogic: Stop below/above structure or VWAP break; risk LOW

name: Bollinger Band Mean Reversion
description: When price closes outside Bollinger Band and shows rejection wick, enter trade toward middle band. Exit near VWAP or mid-band.
entryRules: Price closes outside Bollinger Band with rejection wick
entryLogic: Price closes outside Bollinger Band with rejection wick
exitLogic: Exit on stop or target; avoid: Bands expanding with strong trend
stopLogic: Stop below/above structure or VWAP break; risk LOW

name: VWAP Mean Reversion
description: When price deviates far from VWAP (overextended move) and volume declines, expect snapback toward VWAP.
optionsLogic: Directional toward VWAP (CE if below, PE if above)
exitLogic: Exit on stop or target; avoid: News-driven breakout
stopLogic: Stop below/above structure or VWAP break; risk LOW

name: Liquidity Sweep Reversal
description: If price takes out previous high/low and quickly reverses with strong opposite candle and volume spike, enter reversal trade targeting prior range.
entryRules: Quick reversal with strong opposite candle + volume spike
exitLogic: Exit on stop or target; avoid: Trend continuation (no reversal confirmation)
stopLogic: Stop below/above structure or VWAP break; risk MEDIUM

name: Inside Bar Breakout
description: Detect tight consolidation candle (inside previous candle range). Enter on breakout of that range with volume expansion.
entryRules: Enter on breakout of range with volume expansion
exitLogic: Exit on stop or target; avoid: Already overextended move
stopLogic: Stop below/above structure or VWAP break; risk MEDIUM

name: News Volatility Burst
description: When major news hits and volume surges, enter in direction of first strong impulse move. Use tight trailing stop.
entryRules: Enter in direction of first strong impulse
optionsLogic: Straddle or directional based on sentiment
exitLogic: Exit on stop or target; avoid: Fake news / low liquidity
stopLogic: Stop below/above structure or VWAP break; risk HIGH

name: Time-Based Volatility Play
description: Increase probability weight during known volatility windows (market open, post-lunch, closing hour). Combine with breakout or momentum setup.
entryRules: Trade during volatility windows: open, post-lunch, closing hour
Combine with breakout or momentum setup
entryLogic: Trade during volatility windows: open, post-lunch, closing hour
exitLogic: Exit on stop or target; avoid: Dead mid-session chop
stopLogic: Stop below/above structure or VWAP break; risk MEDIUM

name: IV Expansion Play
description: When IV is low but expected move or event is near, buy options expecting IV expansion and price move.
exitLogic: Exit on stop or target; avoid: IV already high
stopLogic: Stop below/above structure or VWAP break; risk HIGH

name: Gamma Scalping Lite
description: In high volatility environment, scalp quick option price swings using fast momentum bursts. Exit quickly.
entryRules: Quick momentum move in high volatility
Tight stop; small target; exit quickly
optionsLogic: ATM or near-ATM for delta; quick exit
entryLogic: Quick momentum move in high volatility
exitLogic: Exit on stop or target; avoid: Low volatility / wide spreads
stopLogic: Stop below/above structure or VWAP break; risk MEDIUM

name: Straddle Breakout
description: When expecting big move but direction unclear, take ATM straddle. Exit losing leg early when direction confirms.
entryRules: Event or big move expected; direction unclear
ATM straddle; exit losing leg when direction confirms
entryLogic: Event or big move expected; direction unclear
exitLogic: Exit on stop or target; avoid: IV very high already
stopLogic: Stop below/above structure or VWAP break; risk HIGH

name: Sector Rotation Momentum
description: Detect strongest performing sector. Select top relative strength stock from that sector for momentum trade.
entryRules: Select top relative strength stock in that sector
exitLogic: Exit on stop or target; avoid: Sector rotation unclear
stopLogic: Stop below/above structure or VWAP break; risk MEDIUM

name: Index Lead – Stock Lag
bestUseCase: Index trending, stock not yet moved
description: If index is trending strongly but a major component stock hasn't moved yet, trade the lagging stock in index direction.
entryRules: Enter lagging stock in index direction
optionsLogic: CE if index bullish, PE if bearish
exitLogic: Exit on stop or target; avoid: Stock already moved with index
stopLogic: Stop below/above structure or VWAP break; risk MEDIUM

name: Relative Strength Breakout
description: Choose stocks outperforming index on intraday strength. Enter on breakout of consolidation.
avoidWhen: Index weak and stock giving back gains
exitLogic: Exit on stop or target; avoid: Index weak and stock giving back gains
stopLogic: Stop below/above structure or VWAP break; risk MEDIUM

name: Volume Climax Reversal
description: After extreme volume spike and large candle, wait for exhaustion and reversal signal.
entryRules: Wait for exhaustion and reversal signal
exitLogic: Exit on stop or target; avoid: Trend continuation (no exhaustion)
stopLogic: Stop below/above structure or VWAP break; risk HIGH

name: Trend Day VWAP Hold
bestUseCase: Market opens strong and never revisits VWAP
description: If price stays above VWAP for extended time with shallow pullbacks, keep buying dips. Exit only on VWAP breakdown. Identifies true trend days vs fake breakouts.
entryRules: Price above VWAP for extended time
optionsLogic: CE when holding above VWAP; exit on break
entryLogic: Price above VWAP for extended time
exitLogic: Exit on stop or target; avoid: VWAP being tested repeatedly
stopLogic: Stop below/above structure or VWAP break; risk MEDIUM

name: EMA Ribbon Trend Alignment
description: Use 9/20/50 EMA alignment. Enter when all EMAs stacked in one direction and price pulls back to short EMA.
entryRules: All EMAs stacked in one direction
Enter on pullback to short (9) EMA
entryLogic: All EMAs stacked in one direction
exitLogic: Exit on stop or target; avoid: EMAs tangled or crossing
stopLogic: Stop below/above structure or VWAP break; risk MEDIUM

name: Range Compression Breakout
description: Detect decreasing ATR + tight candles. Enter on expansion with volume spike.
entryRules: Enter on expansion with volume spike
exitLogic: Exit on stop or target; avoid: Already expanded / high ATR
stopLogic: Stop below/above structure or VWAP break; risk MEDIUM

name: Failed Breakdown / Breakdown Trap
description: Price breaks support, quickly reclaims level with strong bullish candle → long trade (trap reversal).
entryRules: Quick reclaim with strong bullish candle
exitLogic: Exit on stop or target; avoid: Breakdown with follow-through
stopLogic: Stop below/above structure or VWAP break; risk MEDIUM

name: VWAP Reclaim
description: If price below VWAP early, then reclaims and holds above → bullish shift trade.
optionsLogic: CE on VWAP reclaim and hold
avoidWhen: Reclaim fails and price slips back
exitLogic: Exit on stop or target; avoid: Reclaim fails and price slips back
stopLogic: Stop below/above structure or VWAP break; risk MEDIUM

name: Volume Dry-Up Breakout
description: Volume contracts heavily, then sudden expansion candle → breakout trade.
entryRules: Enter on sudden volume expansion candle
exitLogic: Exit on stop or target; avoid: No clear volume dry-up
stopLogic: Stop below/above structure or VWAP break; risk MEDIUM

name: Daily Breakout Continuation
description: Stock breaks multi-day resistance with strong volume → hold for follow-through days.
entryRules: Break multi-day resistance with strong volume
optionsLogic: CE on breakout; hold or roll
entryLogic: Break multi-day resistance with strong volume
exitLogic: Exit on stop or target; avoid: Low volume breakout
stopLogic: Stop below/above structure or VWAP break; risk MEDIUM

name: Pullback to 20/50 DMA
description: In strong uptrend, buy pullbacks to 20 or 50 day moving average.
exitLogic: Exit on stop or target; avoid: Trend broken / DMA failing
stopLogic: Stop below/above structure or VWAP break; risk MEDIUM

name: Weekly Range Breakout
description: Break of weekly high/low with volume expansion → multi-day momentum.
exitLogic: Exit on stop or target; avoid: Inside week / no clear range
stopLogic: Stop below/above structure or VWAP break; risk MEDIUM

name: Gap & Go (Swing Version)
description: Strong earnings/news gap with high volume → buy first consolidation.
optionsLogic: CE on gap continuation; manage IV
exitLogic: Exit on stop or target; avoid: Gap filling / fading
stopLogic: Stop below/above structure or VWAP break; risk HIGH

name: Stage 2 Trend Breakout (Stan Weinstein)
description: Stock exits long base with rising volume → start of big trend phase.
exitLogic: Exit on stop or target; avoid: Late in trend / extended
stopLogic: Stop below/above structure or VWAP break; risk MEDIUM

name: Swing RSI Compression Breakout
description: RSI stays compressed 40–60 for days then expands → start of momentum swing.
exitLogic: Exit on stop or target; avoid: RSI already extended
stopLogic: Stop below/above structure or VWAP break; risk MEDIUM

name: Darvas Box Breakout
description: Price breaks out of multi-week box range → trend continuation.
exitLogic: Exit on stop or target; avoid: False break from box

name: Relative Strength Swing Leader
description: Stock outperforming index for several days → buy on pullbacks.

entryLogic: Stock outperforming index for several days

description: Price flat but volume rising over days → accumulation → breakout soon.

entryLogic: Price flat, volume rising over days
exitLogic: Exit on stop or target; avoid: Distribution (price up, volume down)
